title: Website Designer/ Developers
job_overview:
Serour Designs is a growing Australian startup agency specialising in website design, web development, and online business solutions. With a consistent stream of leads, we’re looking to expand our team with a reliable and skilled Web Designer/Developer.

This role is ideal for someone who is proactive, collaborative, and confident working across various website platforms and tools.

About the Role:
You’ll work alongside me on client projects for Australian businesses in industries like construction, mortgage broking, cleaning, retail, and more.

I handle the lead generation and discovery calls, we’ll jump on a Zoom call together to discuss the solution, where you’ll be introduced to the client and provide input on the design and technical strategy.

Your job will be to design, build, and deliver the website, plus support with setting up Google Business Profiles and related digital tools as needed.

Required Skills & Tools in one of the following:
WordPress (Elementor, Divi, etc.)
Wix
Squarespace
Figma (basic wireframing and prototyping)

Nice to Have (Not Essential):
SEO best practices
Google Ads or Google Business setup
Content writing (for web copy or blogs)

What You’ll Get:
A steady flow of work – I’ll handle the sales so you can focus on the craft.
Fulltime work – Monday to friday 8hr days.
Long-term growth potential – as the agency scales, so can your role.

If you’re a detail-oriented individual with solid web design skills and a collaborative mindset, I’d love to hear from you.
